data.title: The Killing Fields — Edmonton Public Library
data.meta_description: The Killing Fields — The story of New York Times reporter Sydney Schanberg's friendship with a Cambodian interpreter, Dith Pran, during the time of the 1975 Khmer Rouge revolution.
data.text:
The story of New York Times reporter Sydney Schanberg's friendship with a Cambodian interpreter, Dith Pran, during the time of the 1975 Khmer Rouge revolution.

Community comments are the opinions of contributing users. These comments do not represent the opinions of the Edmonton Public Library.

There are no comments from the community on this title
